a_9.formal problem:
theorem
fixes x :: real and P Q R S :: "real \<Rightarrow> real"
assumes h0 : "\<forall> x. P x = 2 * x powr 2 - 8"

shows  "True"

 *)

and h4 : "\<forall> x. P x = Q x * R x * S x"

  show ?thesis sledgehammer
